name: ecollision
description: This project is designed to simulate to a high degree of accuracy the basics of elastic and inelastic collisions. It is currently part of my A2 Computing Project, the documentation of which can be seen in docs/.

scripts.transbuild: npm run transpile && npm run build
scripts.build-demos: npm run transpile && browserify demo-v2/assets/js/script.js > demo-v2/assets/js/bundle.js && browserify demo/assets/js/script.js > demo/assets/js/bundle.js

author: Jacob Shirley
